name: URL (delimiter, protocol, hostname, path) in title (for keepass)
description:
Adds the URL of the tab to the title:
 * optional delimiter string (defaulting to ' - ')
 * optional protocol string (e.g. 'http://' or 'https://')
 * the URL hostname (e.g. 'foo.org')
 * optionally the the URL path (e.g. '/foo.php')

This is for instance useful for keepass/keepassX/keepassXC users.
